title: Provide 24 hour OPD services – President directs health authorities; A move for a Patient friendly health service
content: The President Sunday directed the Secretary, Health Ministry to initiate a system to keep all Out Patient Departments (OPD) in the Hospitals open to the public, 24 hours.
